views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

A cool animated and customisable activity indicator view !

Configure options from Settings.

iOS 8-11

- IPHONE X ETA NOW.

- LITTLEX COMPATIBILITY (CHECK THE COMPATIBILITY SWITCH IN SETTINGS).

- LITTLEX NO STATUS BAR COMPATIBILITY (if you're using littlex but without the status bar, there's a switch in settings to make it compatible. be sure to have the littlex switch also enabled).

- NOTCHLESSSSS COMPATIBILITY YASSSSSS. (check the switch in settings)

- FORCE SHOW (new feature. explanation: some apps hide the activity indicator and you can't see when they're using internet. now you can all of them to show it - see switch in settings - or leave it default, to the choice of the app).
